doppelganger: Doppelgänger, wake up. You may look at another player's card. You are now that role. If your new role has a night action, do it now.
werewolf: All werewolves, wake up and look for your fellow werewolves. Note: if there is only one werewolf in play, you may look at one center card.
minion: Werewolves, stick out your thumbs. Minion, wake up and look for your masters.
alpha-wolf: Alpha Wolf, wake up. You must exchange the center sideways Werewolf card with another player's card. Note: you may not look at either card. All players: the center sideways Werewolf card may also be viewed or moved.
mystic-wolf: Mystic Wolf, wake up. You may look at another player's card.
dream-wolf: Dream Wolf does not wake at night.
mason: All Masons, wake up and look for your fellow Masons.
sentinel: Sentinel, wake up. You may place a shield token on any player's card except your own. All players: a player's role card with a shield on it cannot be viewed or moved.
bodyguard: Bodyguard does not wake at night.
seer: Seer, wake up. You may look at another player's card, or two of the center cards. If you look at two center cards, make sure not to change their positions.
apprentice-seer: Apprentice Seer, wake up. You may look at one center card.
paranormal-investigator: Paranormal Investigator, wake up. You may look at up to two other players' cards, one at a time. If you see a Werewolf or Tanner card, you must stop. You become a Werewolf or Tanner accordingly.
witch: Witch, wake up. You may look at one center card and exchange it with any player's card. Note: you may not look at the player's card you are exchanging with.
robber: Robber, wake up. You may exchange your card with another player's card, and then look at your new card. You are now on your new card's team. Note: you may not perform your new role's night action.
troublemaker: Troublemaker, wake up. You may exchange the cards of two other players. Note: you may not look at either card.
drunk: Drunk, wake up. Exchange your card with one of the center cards. Note: you may not look at your new card. Even so, you are now on your new card's team.
insomniac: Insomniac, wake up and look at your card.
revealer: Revealer, wake up. You may look at another player's card. If that card is not a Werewolf or Tanner, you must turn it face up.
curator: Curator, wake up. You may look at one Artifact token and place it face down on any player's card.
hunter: Hunter does not wake at night.
tanner: Tanner does not wake at night.
village-idiot: Village Idiot, wake up. You may choose to move all other players' cards one position clockwise or counterclockwise.
werewolf_end: All werewolves, please close your eyes.
alpha-wolf_end: Alpha Wolf, please close your eyes.
mystic-wolf_end: Mystic Wolf, please close your eyes.
minion_end: Minion, please close your eyes. Werewolves, put your thumbs away.
mason_end: All Masons, please close your eyes.
apprentice-seer_end: Apprentice Seer, please close your eyes.
paranormal-investigator_end: Paranormal Investigator, please close your eyes.
village-idiot_end: Village Idiot, please close your eyes.
all_open_eyes: Now everybody please open your eyes.
